titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

action.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Carper. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

term.name: Senate Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

bill.summary: 2/26/2013--Reported to Senate without amendment. Authorizes expenditures by the Senate Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs from March 1, 2013, through September 30, 2013.
